title: THEY STOLES IT FROM US!!!: Post Your Favorite Memories from This Year's OfA!
body:
Fairwell OfA. I raged endlessly about your lottery pick, and now I'll rage endlessly that it's gone. I'll miss our love/hate relationship, just as much as I'll miss watching 5 Vi's punch a single bard in the face.

Post your favorite memories/toxic blackouts from this year's OfA!

replies.body:
That one time I *didn't* get randomly kicked from the lobby.

That one time someone *didn't* dodge the game.

That one time teams *weren't* hopelessly unbalanced between one champion losing horribly in the matchup and the terrible people you were stuck with thanks to the lack of matchmaking.

Just kidding, that last one never happened.
Every time the pick came to random pick, mine was always chosen

We **nearly** beat Garens as Bards.

I'm a Bard main. I play him bruiser top.

Match history for proof: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=CataclysmG
